Rule1: :smiley: Be cool, kind, and civil. Treat all members with respect and express your thoughts in a constructive manner.
Rule2: :abc: Use English only. Communicate in English, but be considerate of all languages.
Rule3: :card_index: Use an appropriate name and avatar. Avoid special characters, emoji, obscenities, and impersonation.
Rule4: :incoming_envelope: Do not spam. Avoid excessive messages, images, formatting, emoji, commands, and @mentions.
Rule5: :no_bell: Do not @mention or direct message Staff. Respect their time, they are people too..
Rule6: :loudspeaker: No self-promotion or advertisements. This includes unsolicited references and links to other social media, servers, communities, and services in chat or direct messages.
Rule7: :shield: No personal information. Protect your privacy and the privacy of others.
Rule8: :head_bandage: No harassment, abuse, or bullying. We have zero-tolerance for harming others.
Rule9: :anger_right: No racist, sexist, anti-LGBTQ+, or otherwise offensive content. We have zero-tolerance for hate speech.
Rule10: :classical_building: No political or religious topics. These complex subjects result in controversial and offensive posts.
Rule11: :rotating_light: No piracy, sexual, NSFW, or otherwise suspicious content. We do not condone illegal or suspicious discussions and activity.
Rule12: :thinking: Rules are subject to common sense. These rules are not comprehensive and use of loopholes to violate the spirit of these rules is subject to enforcement.
Rule13: :scroll: Discord Terms of Service and Community Guidelines apply. You must be at least 13 years old to use Discord, and abide by all other terms and guidelines.
RuleEasterEgg: Oh you found me! Now would you like an egg? :egg:
